coloredTexts.text: Attach an Arrow with a Banana and you will create an awesome Bananarrow!
Attach a Rope with an Arrow to create a Rope Arrow which allow to climb high roofs easliy.
Always use a quiver to keep your arrows in order.
Aim for the impossible. And to your enemy's face.
There's no such thing as luck, only skill.
That in your pocket is an arrow?
I used to be a great hunter, now i'm just a craftsman.
